story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: You sure are active when you battle, Ethan!
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I like to think things through during battle,
so that approach would be difficult for me.
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Yeah. And it’s not just your Pokémon!
YOU move around a lot, too!
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Is there a secret to how you got all that
stamina?
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Actually, yeah! In Johto, we have these
sporting events called Pokéathlons!
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Me and my Pokémon would compete in them
as Pokéathletes!
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I also used to let my Pokémon out of their
Poké Balls and follow me around as I
explored different places.
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I guess they were kind of like my partner
Pokémon even back then.
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
If you’re that fit, I bet you’d do fine against
Pokémon in the Hisui region, too.
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
You know, this is a good opportunity to learn
more about Johto. Could you tell me more
about it?
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: I’d love to visit one day!
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
If I remember correctly, Johto’s right next to
Kanto, and they border each other at
Tohjo Falls.
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Oh, right! Didn’t you say you used to live in
Kanto, Elio?
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
The Johto region has a lot of
Pokémon-related ruins and legends.
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
We’ve got loads of old, traditional buildings,
and we treat Legendary Pokémon with a
great deal of respect.
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
That Lugia of yours is one of Johto’s
Legendary Pokémon, right?
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
And for the Arceus Cup, you have to choose
just one Pokémon to battle with...
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I suppose that means you’ll be battling
with...
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: My bonds are strong with all my Pokémon...
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_2200_10:
But meeting Lugia kind of sums up everything
I’ve experienced in my journey up to now.
story_arceus_05_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: Plus, I’m pretty sure Silver’s gonna go with...
